page.title: 11A DAY AT EPSOM COLLEGE
page.content: {My name is Pascal August and I am a {boarder at Epsom College.}We get up in Wilson house at 6:45 AM; at 7:25 breakfast begins and a usual cooked breakfast and toast is served. We then go back to our house to make our beds and get ready for the day ahead. First chapel at 8:40 AM and then to school. 3 lessons of 40 minutes each are taught before a break of twenty minutes; then 2 more lessons followed by a variable lunch with a choice of two main meals and a dessert. After this there is a break of an hour for house business and other essentials; then games for 90 minutes followed by a tea of bread, jam, and fruit squash. Then a quiet hour until supper at 6:30 PM and 2 preparation periods, with a break of 15 minutes, lasting until 9:25 PM. Finally, bed at 9:45 PM.
